name: Product Documentation Update Reminder
description: Remind to update product.md when implementing features or creating PRs

action.message:
Feature implementation complete. Please check if the following documents need updates:

1. **product.md**: Product specification changes (new features, spec changes, performance improvements, etc.)
2. **tech.md**: Technical implementation changes (architecture, optimization, etc.)
3. **structure.md**: Project structure changes

If updates are needed, reflect the changes and record in the update history section.
